medium: Pen and black ink, gray wash and brush and brown ink on laid paper
title: Elevation and Ground Plan of Altar Dedicated to Female Martyr (recto); Fragment of Architectural Design (verso)
description: recto:  at top--frontal view of an altar with plain pediment and cornice  with Ionic columns flanking a sculpture of a standing woman holding a long plant frond; tomb-like element below; ground plan with measurements at bottom; verso:  linear shaded architectural elements
